description: The Chili Wagon is brought to you by a partnership between Jones Ventures, LLC and AngelReach.org- a local non-profit that is dedicated to helping children transition from foster care into productive and successful adult lives. One of the first opportunities presented to the young adults in this program is to run The Chili Wagon and serve the people of Houston 100% natural and delicious chili dishes. All employees of the truck receive on-site job training and a large portion of the proceeds goes toward Angel Reach to help fund their many beneficial programs. You’ll find all sorts of top-notch chili creations at this truck, like the Luau (Hawaiian BBQ chili), Yard Bird (chicken chili), Gobbler (turkey chili), Loaded Chili Nachos, Frito Pies, Chili & Cheese Macaroni,  burgers, dogs, and so much more. This truck represents a wonderful cause, and with much of their menu being gluten & nitrate-free too, The Chili Wagon makes for the perfect place to get your next tasty fill of Texas’ official food.
name: The Chili Wagon
